message: I have a great product that I think you'll really like. I'm willing to let it go for $120.
I appreciate the offer, but $120 is a bit steep for me.  I'm willing to pay $90 for it.
I understand you're looking for a better deal, but I have to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $110.
I'm still interested, but $110 is still more than I'm willing to pay.  Let's split the difference and go with $105.
I'm glad you're still interested, but I was thinking more along the lines of $115. It's still a good deal for you, and it's worth it to me.
